game_description: Embark on an exhilarating journey through history with Dogfight Elite, a thrilling combat simulator set against the monumental backdrop of World War I and II. Become the master of the skies in Dogfight Elite. Commandeer the cockpit of a warplane, spearhead a tank into battle, or bravely face the enemy on foot as a resilient soldier. The battlefield has never felt this real and the stakes this high. Test your mettle in solo play, navigating through meticulously designed training missions that escalate to adrenaline-charged, full-scale aerial dogfights against relentless enemy combatants. While Dogfight Elite is free-to-play, opting for a subscription unlocks a treasure trove of exclusive benefits. Take to the skies or the battlefield with premium airplanes, tanks, and specially-crafted weapons, and embark on captivating, subscriber-only missions. Moreover, subscribing allows you instant access to our servers and priority queuing, ensuring that your historic battles remain uninterrupted. Experience the past like never before with Dogfight Elite - the battlefield is waiting for you. If you have any requests/complaints please visit www.dogfightelite.com forums. I keep track of all requests and complaints and fix them on each release. Write the details or contact me on the website. I will read your posts and fix it asap!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), Dutch, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: Solid multiplayer plane game. Flying around is fun by itself, but being part of a squad going off to complete various missions is compelling too. The environments are fairly basic and everything could use some further polish, but you can get some multiplayer fun out of Dogfight Elite.
review_2: First time using it and love it! Still need to learn how to use all the features but so far so good :)
review_3: I love how you can go from inside the airplane to riding a horse when they bring you down.
